bio: The much-loved boss of Burly's Beat Camp doesn't go easy on folks he trains. He's there to pump you up, after all!

soultimate.name: Victoryyyyyyyy!
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases ally Attack by 15%, Defense by 105%, movement speed by 12% and Move Meter speed by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: All nearby allies' stats are boosted for a time.

name: Sgt. Burly
